steps: Open the Microsoft Word document Document11.docx.
Navigate to the line that you want to edit or format.
Place the cursor at the beginning of the line.
Press and hold the Shift key on your keyboard.
Use the right arrow key to select the entire line.
Apply the desired formatting options, such as font style, size, or color.
To edit the line, simply start typing to replace the existing content.
To delete the line, press the Backspace or Delete key.
To insert a new line, press the Enter or Return key.
Repeat steps 3-10 for any additional lines you want to edit or format.
Save the changes to the document.
